import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FaArrowLeft, FaArrowRight } from 'react-icons/fa'; const images = [ '/image1.jpg', '/image2.jpg', '/image3.jpg', ]; export default function ProjectDetail() { const { id } = useParams(); const [current, setCurrent] = useState(0); const nextSlide = () => setCurrent((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); const prevSlide = () => setCurrent((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); return (

{`Project ${id.split('-')[1]}`}
